name: Reach or Rewind
description:
You have only 10 seconds to reach the next portal.

What I know:
1 - I am inside an enemy secret base.
2 - The base has time anomalies.
3 - If you are outside of a time portal for 10 seconds, time rewinds.

What I want:
Escape.

What I can do:
Run left - Left Arrow
Run right - Right Arrow
Jump - Up Arrow
Shoot - Space
Pause - Esc

Developed by Ivan Moraleja

Art:
gameart2d.com
bevouliin.com
carlosalface.blogspot.pt

Sound: freesound.org

Music: Firestarter, by Jeremy Black

Font: Atiba, by Ozan Karakoc.
